content.query:
---------------
--view calender
------------------
CREATE VIEW GOLD.CALENDER
AS
Select 
    *
     from 
     OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'https://storagevamshi177.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Calendar/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
     ) a;

------------
--VIEW Customers
----------

CREATE VIEW GOLD.CUSTOMERS
AS
Select 
    *
     from 
     OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'https://storagevamshi177.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Customers/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
     ) a;

--------
--Product_subcategories
--------
CREATE VIEW GOLD.Product_subcategories
AS
Select 
    *
     from 
     OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'https://storagevamshi177.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Product_Subcategories/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
     ) a;


Drop view GOLD.Product_sales


---------------
--Products
--------------
CREATE VIEW GOLD.Products
AS
Select 
    *
     from 
     OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'https://storagevamshi177.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Products/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
     ) a;

----------------
--Sales*
---------------
CREATE VIEW GOLD.Sales
AS
Select 
    *
     from 
     OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'https://storagevamshi177.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Sales*/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
     ) a;

------------------
--Territories
-----------------
CREATE VIEW GOLD.Territories
AS
Select 
    *
     from 
     OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'https://storagevamshi177.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Territories/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
     ) a;

----------------
--Return
---------------

CREATE VIEW GOLD.Returns
AS
Select 
    *
     from 
     OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'https://storagevamshi177.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_returns/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
     ) a;
